title: Adiyae Azhagae Lyrics Oru Naal Koothu Song Lyrics
stanzas: Oru Naal Koothu Adiyae Azhagae Song Lyrics

Adiyae Azhagae
yen azhagae adiyae
pesaama
nooru nooraa
kooru podaadha

vazhiyae vazhiyae
yen oliyae oliyae
naan onnum boodhamilla
dhooram odaadha

kaadhoda nee ericha
vaartha vandhu keerudhe.
aanaalum nee thelicha
kadhal ulla oorudhe.

vaayaadi peyaa en
thookka thookki pora.
